𓅭𓇳 GynSon “son of the Sun” 𓅬

𓎛𓅭 1. dough 2. Docht 𓎛 (wick) 3. 𓅭 duck 4. 𓅭𓏏 daugher

The Genesis of the Egyptian (and PIE) family is deeply rooted in a bird cult:
